00020 #include "rvictimonmap.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00023 
00024 RDK2_FACTORY(RVictimOnMap);
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 RVictimOnMap::RVictimOnMap() :
00029     zPosition(0.), confirmedOp(false), confirmedAI(false),
00030     falsePositiveOp(false), falsePositiveAI(false), reliabilityOp(0.), reliabilityAI(0.),
00031     temperatureOp(0.), temperatureAI(0.)
00032 {
00033     snapshotOp = new RImage(3, 3, RImage::RGB32);
00034     snapshotAI = new RImage(3, 3, RImage::RGB32);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void RVictimOnMap::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00038 {
00039     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00040         w->write_i8(confirmedOp);       w->write_i8(confirmedAI);   
00041         w->write_i8(falsePositiveOp);   w->write_i8(falsePositiveAI);
00042         w->write_f32(reliabilityOp);    w->write_f32(reliabilityAI);
00043         w->writeString(idOp);           w->writeString(idAI);
00044         w->writeString(descriptionOp);  w->writeString(descriptionAI);
00045         w->writeString(motionOp);       w->writeString(motionAI);
00046         w->write_f32(temperatureOp);    w->write_f32(temperatureAI);
00047         w->writeString(soundOp);        w->writeString(soundAI);
00048         w->writeString(situationOp);    w->writeString(situationAI);
00049         w->writeString(statusOp);       w->writeString(statusAI);
00050         w->writeString(partsOp);        w->writeString(partsAI);
00051         w->writeObject(true, snapshotOp); w->writeObject(true, snapshotAI);
00052         w->write_f32(pose.x);
00053         w->write_f32(pose.y);
00054         w->write_f32(pose.theta);
00055         w->write_f32(zPosition);
00056         w->write_f32(robotPose.x);
00057         w->write_f32(robotPose.y);
00058         w->write_f32(robotPose.theta);
00059     w->doneWriting();
00060 }
00061 
00062 string RVictimOnMap::getLogLine()
00063 {
00064     double victimDist = robotPose.distTo(pose);
00065     double victimTheta = atan2(pose.y - robotPose.y, pose.x - robotPose.x) - robotPose.theta;
00066     ostringstream oss;
00067     oss << "VICTIM " << victimTheta << " " << victimDist << " "
00068         << robotPose.x << " " << robotPose.y << " " << robotPose.theta << " " << idAI << " "
00069         << timestamp.getMsFromMidnight() << " unknown " << timestamp.getMsFromMidnight();
00070     return oss.str();
00071 }
00072 
00073 void RVictimOnMap::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00074 {
00075     r->startReading(getClassName());
00076         confirmedOp = r->read_i8();         confirmedAI = r->read_i8();
00077         falsePositiveOp = r->read_i8();     falsePositiveAI = r->read_i8();
00078         reliabilityOp = r->read_f32();      reliabilityAI = r->read_f32();
00079         idOp = r->readString();             idAI = r->readString();
00080         descriptionOp = r->readString();    descriptionAI = r->readString();
00081         motionOp = r->readString();         motionAI = r->readString();
00082         temperatureOp = r->read_f32();      temperatureAI = r->read_f32();
00083         soundOp = r->readString();          soundAI = r->readString();
00084         situationOp = r->readString();      situationAI = r->readString();
00085         statusOp = r->readString();         statusAI = r->readString();
00086         partsOp = r->readString();          partsAI = r->readString();
00087         snapshotOp = dynamic_cast<RImage*>(r->readObject());
00088         snapshotAI = dynamic_cast<RImage*>(r->readObject());
00089         pose.x = r->read_f32();
00090         pose.y = r->read_f32();
00091         pose.theta = r->read_f32();
00092         zPosition = r->read_f32();
00093         robotPose.x = r->read_f32();
00094         robotPose.y = r->read_f32();
00095         robotPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00096     r->doneReading();
00097 }
00098 
00099 RDK2::Object* RVictimOnMap::clone() const
00100 {
00101     RVictimOnMap* r = (RVictimOnMap*) (new RVictimOnMap(*this));
00102     r->snapshotOp = (RImage*) (this->snapshotOp->clone());
00103     r->snapshotAI = (RImage*) (this->snapshotAI->clone());
00104     return r;
00105 }
00106 
00107 RVictimOnMap::~RVictimOnMap()
00108 {
00109     delete snapshotOp;
00110     delete snapshotAI;
00111 }
00112 
00113 double RVictimOnMap::computeTemperatureMean()
00114 {
00115     double temperatureMean = 0.;
00116     for (size_t i = 0; i < temperatureCache.size(); i++) {
00117         temperatureMean += temperatureCache[i];
00118     }
00119     temperatureMean /= temperatureCache.size();
00120     return temperatureMean;
00121 }
00122 
00123 double RVictimOnMap::computeSeenPartsMean()
00124 {
00125     double seenPartsMean = 0.;
00126     for (size_t i = 0; i < seenPartsCache.size(); i++) {
00127         seenPartsMean += seenPartsCache[i];
00128     }
00129     seenPartsMean /= seenPartsCache.size();
00130     return seenPartsMean;
00131 }
00132 
00133 Point2od RVictimOnMap::computePoseMean()
00134 {
00135     Point2od poseMean(0., 0., 0.);
00136     if (poseCache.size() > 0) {
00137         for (size_t i = 0; i < poseCache.size(); i++) {
00138             poseMean.x += poseCache[i].x;
00139             poseMean.y += poseCache[i].y;
00140         }
00141         poseMean.x /= poseCache.size();
00142         poseMean.y /= poseCache.size();
00143     }
00144     return poseMean;
00145 }
